DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study investigate metabolic endocrine responses 3 hour take 75g fructose glucose young Chinese .
DOC.brief_title: Acute Metabolic Endocrine Responses Glucose Fructose Healthy Young Subjects
DOC.detailed_description: The study double-blinded , randomize , crossover trial . Twenty healthy volunteer randomize two group : group A ( 300ml 22.5 % glucose ) group B ( 300ml 22.5 % fructose ) .Volunteer randomize either group A B , 8-h overnight fasting , take 300ml solution 0830 within 5 minute . After one-week washout period , volunteer cross either group B A. intervention , venous blood collect 0h , 0.5h , 1h , 2h , 3h blood pressure test 0h , 1h , 2h , 3h .
DOC.criteria: Inclusion criterion age 1939 year , BMI 1824 kg/m 2 . Subjects pregnant history hepatic renal disease , fructose intolerance , gout , hypoglycemia , diabetes mellitus exclude . Subjects take drug , botanical , nutraceutical know influence blood pressure also reject either .
